channel.title: ThaCraft | FACTIONS & SURVIVAL | 32GB SSD Host | PvP & 24/7 | Creative World
channel.description:
[b]Server Name:[/b] ThaCraft
[b]Server Address/IP:[/b] play.thacraft.com
[b]Website:[/b] http://thacraft.com
[b]Type: [/b]PvP, Factions, Survival
[b]Description:[/b] We simply focus on Factions & Survival. We want players to enjoy the full capacity of Minecraft through challenges offered by Factions which are controlled by players. Players who control factions also control land. We'd love new players to join our server, especially role models for our server, mature players who understand the game and the fun that can be achieved.
[b]Rules:[/b]
No Cheating / Hacking No Begging / Asking for Items No Begging / Asking for Ranks Griefing Is Allowed Scamming Is Allowed No Flaming No Impersonating Admins or Players No Building / Claiming at Spawn No Advertising
[b]More can be found at:[/b] http://thacraft.com/rules
